summary: Premium royal-themed multi-page website for ROYAL BIKANA CATERERS (Indian wedding catering company in Bikaner, Rajasthan) with Rajputana design (maroon/wine + gold), logo concept, menu, gallery, contact/WhatsApp booking, and SEO-focused fast mobile-friendly build.
architectural_notes: Site language: simple, professional Indian English
Use placeholder images for gallery if real images are not available
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Royal logo with crown, shield, and cooking pot (handi), gold on transparent background (royal-bikana-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Royal maroon/wine textured hero background with subtle Indian pattern accents (hero-royal-texture.dim_1920x1080.jpg)
- Subtle seamless Indian motif pattern tile in maroon and gold (pattern-tile-rajputana.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Wedding catering setup placeholder photo (gallery-wedding-setup.dim_1200x800.jpg)
- Live food counter placeholder photo (gallery-live-counter.dim_1200x800.jpg)
- Royal food presentation placeholder photo (gallery-royal-presentation.dim_1200x800.jpg)
- Wedding/party atmosphere placeholder photo (gallery-atmosphere.dim_1200x800.jpg)
- Gold crown icon (icon-crown-gold.dim_128x128.png)
- Gold shield icon (icon-shield-gold.dim_128x128.png)
- Gold handi/cooking pot icon (icon-handi-gold.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Implement a multi-page marketing website for the catering business with the following pages and navigation: Home, About Us, Services, Menu, Gallery, Contact. Include a responsive header with the business name "ROYAL BIKANA CATERERS", tagline "Shahi Swad • Royal Andaaz", and clear navigation links that work on mobile (hamburger menu) and desktop.

Apply the requested premium Royal Rajputana visual design consistently across all pages: maroon/wine red base, gold accents, subtle traditional Indian pattern textures, and royal elements (crown/shield motifs). The layout must remain clean and modern while retaining a traditional Indian touch, and must be mobile-first and performant.

Build the Home page with: (a) hero section using a royal background, (b) heading "Royal Wedding & Event Catering in Bikaner", (c) subheading "Authentic Marwari & Shahi Cuisine for Weddings, Parties & Events", and (d) two CTA buttons labeled "Book Catering" and "Get Menu" that navigate users to Contact and Menu pages respectively. Add a highlight section listing: Live Catering Available, Pure & Hygienic Food, Royal Marwari Special, Wedding • Party • Events • Corporate Catering.
Build the About Us page and render the provided About content exactly (verbatim) in professional English formatting suitable for a premium wedding-catering brand.

Build the Services page displaying the requested service list with icons and a premium card/grid layout: Wedding Catering, Engagement & Reception Catering, Birthday Party Catering, Anniversary & Family Functions, Corporate Catering, Live Food Counters, Royal Marwari Thali, Customized Menu Planning.

Build the Menu page with visually distinct categorized sections and include all requested items under each category exactly as provided: Royal Marwari Special (Live), Veg Main Course, Rice & Bread, Starters & Chaat, Sweets, Beverages.

Build the Gallery page showcasing: wedding catering setup, live food counters, royal food presentation, and wedding/party atmosphere using high-quality placeholder images when real images are not available. Use a responsive grid with a lightbox/modal view for larger preview.

Build the Contact page displaying the provided phone contacts and location, include a WhatsApp availability note, add a "Book Now on WhatsApp" button, and implement a simple contact form with fields: Name, Mobile Number, Event Type, Event Date, Message. Form submission must show a clear success/failure state.

Add a premium footer across all pages that includes: business name, tagline, both phone numbers, location "Bikaner, Rajasthan", and social icons for Instagram and WhatsApp. Social icons must link out (WhatsApp to wa.me; Instagram can be a placeholder link if no handle is provided).

Implement SEO-friendly structure and basic on-page SEO for all pages: meaningful page titles, meta descriptions, semantic headings, and performance-friendly assets. Include the provided keywords naturally in relevant page copy and/or meta descriptions without keyword stuffing: "Best Caterers in Bikaner", "Wedding Caterers in Bikaner", "Marwari Catering Service", "Royal Catering Bikaner".

new_feature_requests.summary: Create royal Rajputana-themed website design (maroon/wine red with golden accents, crown/shield/pattern elements), clean modern layout with traditional Indian touch; mobile-friendly and fast-loading
Implement website pages: Home, About Us, Services, Menu, Gallery (with placeholders), Contact, plus footer with business details and social icons
Home page hero and CTA buttons (Book Catering, Get Menu) plus highlight sections (Live Catering, Hygienic Food, Royal Marwari Special, catering types)
Services page with icon-based list of offered services (wedding/engagement/birthday/anniversary/corporate/live counters/royal thali/custom menu)
Menu page with categorized menu sections and listed items (Royal Marwari Special Live, Veg Main Course, Rice & Bread, Starters & Chaat, Sweets, Beverages)
Contact page with phone numbers, location, simple contact form fields, WhatsApp availability, and 'Book Now on WhatsApp' button
Logo requirement: royal logo concept combining crown + shield + cooking pot (handi)
SEO-friendly structure with target keywords, optimized performance for fast loading and mobile/desktop

Implement backend support for saving contact inquiries (leads) submitted from the Contact form, including fields: name, mobileNumber, eventType, eventDate (optional), message, createdAt timestamp. Provide a backend query method to list inquiries for later use/debugging (no public admin UI required unless added later).
